ref: 2539 *ōggara ʻ gruel ʼ. [← Turk. ögrä, ükrä, üg˚ ʻ soup ʼ Brockelmann Mitteltürk. Wb. 235, ʻ vermicelli ʼ Radloff Vergl. Wb. i 1813]
Pk. oggara -- m. ʻ a kind of rice or grain ʼ;
P. ogrā m. ʻ thick rice water ʼ;
Ku. ogro, wag˚ ʻ gruel of rice and pulse as a sick diet ʼ;
H. ogrā, oghrā m. ʻ a mixed dish, gruel, pottage ʼ.
